title: Hey Marcel
brief_description: Images of figures descending staircases are orchestrated in four movements. Made with the assistance of the Creative Development Branch of the Australian Film Commission. Music by Bill McDonald; idea suggested by Chris Kennedy; lighting by Graeme Wood and David Lindsay. No spoken word.
